getDelegation(address).notice: Get the delegation address for the staking

hasPendingRebalance(address).notice: Check if validator has pending rebalance

reportRewardEvent(address,uint256).notice: Report a reward event for a validator

reportSlashingEvent(address,uint256).notice: Reports a slashing event for a validator

setDelegation(address,address).notice: Set the delegation address for the staking

totalRewards().notice: Get total rewards across all validators

validatorAt(uint256).notice: Gets validator info at a specific index

validatorCount().notice: Gets the total number of validators

validatorInfo(address).notice: Gets validator info for a specific address

validatorRewards(address).notice: Get the total rewards earned by a validator

validatorSlashing(address).notice: Get the total amount slashed from a validator
